FAQ / Wave 1 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Team-Up Tactics

  1. What happens if a character is both a Truck and a Car? [Source: WotC]
    There aren’t any characters that are both a Truck and a Car.
  2. Yeah, but like, what if? [Source: WotC]
    That’s not a real question.
  3. Come on… I want to know! [Source: WotC]
    You would repair 2 damage from it and then you would draw 2 cards.
  4. When are you going to make a character that’s a Truck and a Car? [Source: WotC]
    …
  5. I have Menasor on the field and two Team-Up Tactics in my hand. If I play them, do they do nothing, am I forced to pick one effect, or do both effects go off? [Source: WotC]
    Menasor is not a truck or a car, so Team-Up Tactics would have no effect on him.
